Title: Prevents nonresident race horse owners from avoiding use tax in certain situations; repealer
Summary: Repeals certain provisions relating to use tax exemptions for certain race horses; prevents nonresident race horse owners from avoiding use tax in certain situations.
LawCode: Rpld §1115 sub (a) ¶29, §1118 subs 9 & 10, amd §1118, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to use tax exemptions for certain race horses; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
